export const Badge = (props) => <><span class={'badge badge--' + props.class}>{props.text}</span></>


Subscribe to be notified when a transaction is on error


```graphql
transactionError(
  address: Address!
): TransactionError
```


### Arguments

#### [<code style={{ fontWeight: 'normal' }}>transactionError.<b>address</b></code>](#)<Bullet />[`Address!`](/build/api/schema/scalars/address) <Badge class="secondary" text="non-null"/> <Badge class="secondary" text="scalar"/>
> 
> 

### Type

#### [`TransactionError`](/build/api/schema/objects/transaction-error) <Badge class="secondary" text="object"/>
> [TransactionError] represents an error.

>
